Description:
Detects suspicious service installation commands

Author: pH-T (Nextron Systems), Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Service Installation
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045' and (imagepath like '% -nop %' or imagepath like '% -sta %' or imagepath like '% -w hidden %' or imagepath like '%:\temp\%' or imagepath like '%.downloadfile(%' or imagepath like '%.downloadstring(%' or imagepath like '%\admin$\%' or imagepath like '%\perflogs\%' or imagepath like '%&&%')
